item.description:
Before he was President, did young Abe slay Vampires?

A.

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abraham_Lincoln,_Vampire_Hunter

Those of you who live North and West of New Haven do not

Have to RSVP No and say that it is too far for you to travel.

I will delete that post if I read it.

I went to a movie in North Haven recently and no one came.

So you had your chance to attend a Movie Meet Up

North of New Haven. I will have another Meet Up North

of New Haven in a this Saturday.
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes.
